title: Trinity Force Has Become Worthless
body:
Okay, I'm sure we've all had the hype for Trinity Force+Essence Reaver for Ez and Corki, the 40% CDR and everything, but... I mean... Who picks up a Trinity Force anymore?

Looking at all the champions who used to rush it first, all of them have either thrown it into the trash can and moved onto a Rageblade+Gunblade rush or their winrates have gone down by a couple percent. Just looking at Ezreal, we've seen him go from 49% in 5.21 to about 47% in 5.22. Everyone had huge hype for Ez to be the king of the ADC's with 40% CDR in just two items, but in reality, this item isn't even worth getting anymore and this board is full of people telling others to go with Blue Build again. Blue Build was designed for heavy kiting, not for the most damage but right now blue is doing more damage and it's not because it got buffs to any of its core items, in fact Iceborn lost AP, BotRK was nerfed, and the like... but none of them were nerfed as hard as Trinity. Even Corki has gone down with Trinity (Though that's likely because Trinity isn't being affected by Corki's passive like the original Corki post had told us it would, plus Corki's new W isn't the easiest to use). Jax and Irelia are facerolling with Rageblade and Gunblade.

Heck, the one champion who got the most out of these item changes and even got a buff with the new Trinity Force has gone down in win rate... Gangplank, who has been dying for crit chance and CDR can now get 40% crit and 40% CDR in 2 items on top of mana, lots of AD, and mana return on crits... is doing -worse-?!

What's up with this new Trinity. Why's it still cost the same outrageous cost for 25 AD, 15% AS, 20% crit, 250 mana, 10% CDR, 250 health, and 5% MS? It used to give 30 AD, 30AP, 30% AS (TriForce. Tri. Tri. Tri is 3. 30. 3 in 30....), 10% crit, 250 health, 8% MS, and 250 mana. So we lost 30 AP, 15% AS, 5 AD, and 3% MS to gain 10% CDR and 10% crit. 4 stat deductions for two stat increases?

This it is not only having an identity crisis, it's a 3800g item that gives some of the worst stats in the game. What is this item supposed to be good at anymore? The extra 100-200 of uncritable damage isn't worth 3800g. A normal Crit/AS item gives more overall damage to champs who used to get Trinity Force and the AS/Crit items had their AS NERFED too... so what's up with this?

6 item build in 20-25 minute games, yeah good luck with that
I know xD, but when you get the muramana, the essence reaver and the runaan it is actually already done, you have almost all what you need.

I think the problem is 2-sided.

Trinity force needs a slight buff. Even just a cost reduction to make it combine for free would be a start. It no longer deserves to be the most expensive item in the game.

The second problem is Rageblade is absurdly OP right now. I mean when global gold income went up and most items were made more costly to compensate, we have the following changes to rageblade:

Buffs:
Price down 90g
Melee attacks stack twice as fast
AS per stack doubled from 4% to 8%
3 AD per stack added
Guinsoo's Rage at 8 stacks = 20 + 15% AD + 7.5% AP on hit in AOE

Nerfs:
Abilities no longer grant stacks
Passive: Falling below 50% health grants you 20% attack speed, 10% life steal and 10% spell vamp until you exit combat - 30 second cooldown.

Like SERIOUSLY? WHO IN THE WORLD THOUGHT OF THIS???

Yes, the item was undertuned before. The double stacks per melee attack and unique passive alone would have been a sufficient buff though. No need to add on a potential 32% AS, 24AD, and make it cheaper while gold income increased and other costs went up! 

WITHOUT the passive when fully stacked it's over 200% gold efficient (235?) and again double stacks on melee so anyone with an auto attack reset can get it fully stacked in a matter of less than 2 seconds (oh, and stacks count up on minions too...).

Nerfs you forgot:

Loses
>Unique Passive: Falling below 50% health grants you 20% attack speed, 10% life steal and 10% spell vamp until you exit combat - 30 second cooldown.

Thanks, that wasn't on the Wiki :( I felt like something was missing. Still, since it only worked under 50% health and had a relatively large cooldown after exiting combat I'd imagine the old passive wasn't very strong. The item still received an insane buff alongside a cost decrease when most other items got cost increases and some even got stat nerfs...

The passive was _very_ strong in the right circumstances, giving you increased dps and sustain until the current fight was done, and giving you a window to heal yourself up afterwards if you could get to a minion wave or jungle camp in time.

I'd argue the passive appeared overly strong because opponents didn't realize what was happening with the stat change mid-fight and disengage and wait it out for the cooldown...

I'll agree that I can see its uses though. I hope you agree the current iteration of the item is a clear buff though.

I'd call it a _conditional_ buff.  The removal of stacks-on-spells makes it quite a bit harder for some champions to get the bonuses in a reasonable time-frame to affect an engagement that they weren't already preparing for.  This is particularly difficult for (full-time) ranged champions who weren't compensated with two stacks per AA.
I want to see the stacks per cast back t.t, Also it is now too OP, riot needs a new Balance crew.

the reall issue with it currently is trying to make it have an identity of a marksmen item when it really it is more of an on hit damage item then anything.

Crit is useless on several abilities that apply on hit. Irelia's Q and Ez Q come to mind and the only champ who really got a net boost all around from crit chance and CDR instead of AP and the 15% lost attack speed is gankplank.

I still feel like Riot did not really try to make the recurve bow work in place of zeal and sheen would be perfectly fine having 5% movement speed instead of 10% CDR. Replace 10% of the CDR on IBG with 5% movement speed and problem solved for it's stats. replace zeal with recurve bow and make it do 30 on hit magic damage and have 30% attack speed again and something that after rageblade is nerfed be it stats or cost will be worth calling the goo to item for the likes of most of the champs who have classically gotten trinity.
